description: This file defines a Task entity class for a backend application, mapped to a MongoDB collection. It includes fields for task properties such as userId, title, description, completion status, timestamps, and due date, with associated getters, setters, and utility methods.

classes.name: Task
classes.description: Entity class representing a task with properties for user association, description, status, timestamps, and due date, stored in MongoDB.

methods.name: touch
methods.description: Updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp to current instant.
